00044 // random number
00045 inline static double ranmag(double magnitude)
00046 {
00047   return magnitude*(double)(rand()-RAND_MAX/2)/(double)(RAND_MAX/2);
00048 }
00049 
00050 // primitive shaking 
00051 void shakePara(Para* q, double magnitude)
00052 {
00053   int i;
00054 
00055   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00056     q->x[i] = q->x[i]*(1+ranmag(magnitude)) + ranmag(magnitude);
00057 }
00058

00060 #define BUFSIZE 255
00061 
00062 int readParafromFile(Parameterization* P, Para* q, const char* fname)
00063 {
00064   FILE* fp;
00065 
00066   if (!(fp = fopen(fname, "r"))) {  
00067     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for reading\n", fname);
00068     return -1;
00069   }
00070 
00071   fprintf(stderr, "... reading Parameters from file %s\n", fname);
00072 
00073   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00074 
00075   do
00076     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00077   while (strncmp(buf, "<Parameterization", 16) && !feof(fp));
00078   if (feof(fp)) {
00079     fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Parameterization ...>\n");
00080     return -1;
00081   }
00082 
00083   char Pname[80];
00084   sscanf(buf, "<Parameterization %s>", Pname);
00085   stripstr(Pname, ">");
00086   
00087   if (!strcmp(Pname, "FMD"))
00088     *P = ParameterizationFMD;
00089   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "FMDr"))
00090     *P = ParameterizationFMDr;
00091   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "FMDS"))
00092     *P = ParameterizationFMDS;
00093   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "FMDreal"))
00094     *P = ParameterizationFMDreal;
00095   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "AMD"))
00096     *P = ParameterizationAMD;
00097   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "AMDd"))
00098     *P = ParameterizationAMDd;
00099   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "AMDS"))
00100     *P = ParameterizationAMDS;
00101   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "AMDA"))
00102     *P = ParameterizationAMDA;
00103   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "AMDAS"))
00104     *P = ParameterizationAMDAS;
00105   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "Alpha"))
00106     *P = ParameterizationAlpha;
00107   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "AlphaA"))
00108     *P = ParameterizationAlphaA;
00109   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "AlphaC"))
00110     *P = ParameterizationAlphaC;
00111   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "Cluster"))
00112     *P = ParameterizationCluster;
00113   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "CoreFMD"))
00114     *P = ParameterizationCoreFMD;
00115   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "ClusterFMD"))
00116     *P = ParameterizationClusterFMD;
00117   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "ClustersFMD"))
00118     *P = ParameterizationClustersFMD;
00119   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "FMDd3h"))
00120     *P = ParameterizationFMDd3h;
00121   else if (!strcmp(Pname, "FMDvxz"))
00122     *P = ParameterizationFMDvxz;
00123   else {
00124     fprintf(stderr, "Parameterization %s not implemented\n", Pname);
00125     return -1;
00126   }
00127 
00128   return P->Pararead(fp, q);
00129 
00130 }
